ygData.subject: Re: Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: I m going to assume you have at least full cloth, derv rings, onyx earrings or something around there. Your long term goals should be to rasie 150pp to buy:
ygData.messageBody:
I'm going to assume you have at least full cloth, derv rings, onyx
earrings or something around there.

Your long term goals should be to rasie 150pp to buy:
Lockjaw Vest (12ac +5sta)
2 Jagged Bands (5ac +3str)

Aside from that you should look into Mesh and Cured silk. I would go
with cured silk for the look. Best way to get it is buy all the
ingrediants and hunt out a master tailor. They probably make for free.

Good Luck
